name: crochet-site-template
description: static website template setup with crochet

scripts.build: rimraf o && run-p build-js build-css && echo ✔ done production build
scripts.build-debug: rimraf o && run-p build-js-debug build-css && echo ✔ done debug build
scripts.build-js: tsc && browserify o/script.js -g [ envify --NODE_ENV production ] -g uglifyify > o/script.bundle.uncompressed.js && uglifyjs -cm < o/script.bundle.uncompressed.js > o/script.bundle.js && node o/crochet-script
scripts.build-js-debug: tsc && browserify --debug o/script.js > o/script.bundle.js && node o/crochet-script
